body: At STUWIN, we believe education should build trust, not anxiety. Our platform is engineered to protect the parent-child relationship while maximizing student autonomy.

vision_points.title: The Trust-First Reporting Model
vision_points.description: We don't show raw scores to parents. We report exclusively on 'Work Done on Mistakes'. By focusing on effort over failure, we eliminate the child's urge to hide results and prevent parent-child tension.

vision_points.title: Micro-Block Interactive Flow
vision_points.description: Learning is delivered in small, high-intensity blocks. This keeps sessions interactive, reduces cognitive load, and makes 'skipping' almost impossible through engagement.

vision_points.title: Guided Navigation vs. Output
vision_points.description: Our AI is a navigator, not a solver. It will never finish homework for a student. Instead, it guides them through the Socratic method so they achieve the solution themselves.

vision_points.title: Motivation Over Output
vision_points.description: A student motivated to work on their weak points is a student destined for success.
